en.indicator_name: Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
en.target_name: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
en.un_designated_tier: Tier I
